comments.body: Please add `# license_file: LICENSE` with a note that it will be included in the next release and thus should be uncommented then.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +34,38 @@  home: http://github.com/seomoz/simhash-py/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  # the licence file was excluded from PyPi's .tar.gz in v0.4.0 by accident
  # but it will be included in the following releases
